# Bike sharing
url: https://archive.ics.uci.edu/dataset/275/bike+sharing+dataset \

Possible RQ's: \
* Can weather and day data predict the amount of daily bike rentals? (linear) \
* Can weather and bike rental amount predict the season? (logistic) \

Meets requirements: \
* continuous outcome (e.g. temp, windspeed) \
* 2 continuous predictors (e.g. casual, registered) \
* categorical predictor (e.g. season) \
* binary outcome (e.g holiday, workday) \

```{r read bike}
bike_df <- read.csv("../data/bike.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")

head(bike_df, 20)
```
